description: Pool or 8 Ball pool is a famous game, which is played professionally across the world. 8 Ball Pool online is usually played on a Pool Table as a singles or doubles game with cue sticks and 16 balls, 15 object balls, and one cue ball, which is used to strike other balls. 8-Ball Pool online is a relatively high-speed game compared to snooker and billiards which are two other closely-related cue sports.
In India, 8 Ball Pool has gained immense attention and millions play it, both online and offline.
vpl’s 8 Ball Pool Game is among the best online pool games out there, thanks to its smooth and easy gameplay.

data.header: How to play 8 Ball Pool game online with vpl

description: The objective of 8 Ball Pool online is to put all your designated balls (either stripes or solids) in the pockets followed by the 8 ball (black ball). The player who pots the 8 ball wins the game. On vpl, 8 ball pool game matches often consist of one-on-one battles. To win more, players can participate in special free tournaments where online 8 Ball Pool matches often consist of several games in a ‘best out of’ format. Here, the players must use their skills and record the maximum number of wins to win the tournament and earn real money.
The objective of 8 Ball Pool online is to put all your designated balls (either stripes or solids) in the pockets followed by the 8 ball (black ball). The player who pots the 8 ball wins the game.

normalContent: Once you enter the 8 ball Pool game, you or your opponent will be asked to place the cue ball on or behind the head string on the Pool Table.
Drag your cue stick in a circular direction to aim at the ball.
You can use the strike point option on the cue ball to spin the ball when required.
Pull down the cue stick to control the force and release it to take the shot.
